title: Iban Blast

properties.name: description
properties.value: Iban Blast is a combat spell that can be cast at 50 Magic. It can inflict up to 25 damage (27 with the Occult necklace, 28 with the Slayer helmet (i), 31 with the Occult necklace and Slayer helmet (i) while on task, or 32 with the Occult necklace, Slayer helmet (i) while on task, and an Imbued God cape).

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Iban Blast (historical)The RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Iban blast
Iban Blast
Released 3 March 2003 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 50
Spellbook Standard
Type Combat
Experience 30
Damage 25
Runes 5 1
Casting speed 5 ticks
Quest Underground Pass
Description Summons the wrath of Iban
Animation
Sound Effect

Iban Blast is a combat spell that can be cast at 50 Magic. It can inflict up to 25 damage (27 with the Occult necklace, 28 with the Slayer helmet (i), 31 with the Occult necklace and Slayer helmet (i) while on task, or 32 with the Occult necklace, Slayer helmet (i) while on task, and an Imbued God cape).

To cast this spell, the player must be wielding Iban's staff; thus, the player must complete Underground Pass and have level 50 Attack in order to be able to cast this spell. Each cast consumes one charge from Iban's staff when cast on an NPC, or two charges if cast on another player. Thus this spell can be cast a total of 120 times (60 in PvP) before the staff must be recharged. This is increased to 2500 (1250 in PvP) with Iban's upgraded staff.

This spell may be autocast with Iban's staff.

Cost[edit | edit source]

Spell cost
InputCost
51211
Combo runes
15216
15781
15896
Off-hands
1186

If the player chooses to pay the Dark Mage to recharge the Iban's staff, at a price of 100,000 coins, an additional cost of 833.33 coins per spell should be considered. For the Iban's upgraded staff, the price for recharging is 250,000 coins for 2500 spells, reducing the additional cost to 100 coins per spell. There's also a way to recharge it for free if you enter the cave from the underground pass through the other side. Travel to Lletya with the teleport crystal and walk north towards the cave entrance. Enter the cave and climb down the well. Make your way to the throne room and open the doors. Use your staff on the well and it will be recharged for free.

Because Iban's staff is required to cast this spell, the player cannot use elemental staves to substitute any of the runes. However, a tome of fire in the shield slot may be used to substitute fire runes. Note that Iban Blast is not classified as a fire spell, so casting it will not consume any of the tome's charges and will not provide the 50% damage boost.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 August 2014
(update | poll)

Iban's staff can now auto-cast Iban Blast.

'''Iban Blast''' is a [[combat spell]] that can be cast at 50 [[Magic]]. It can inflict up to 25 damage (27 with the [[Occult necklace]], 28 with the [[Slayer helmet (i)]], 31 with the Occult necklace and Slayer helmet (i) while on task, or 32 with the Occult necklace, Slayer helmet (i) while on task, and an [[Imbued god cape|Imbued God cape]]). 
[[File:Iban blast.png|left|Close up of the Iban's Blast projectile.]]
To cast this spell, the player must be wielding [[Iban's staff]]; thus, the player must complete [[Underground Pass]] and have level 50 [[Attack]] in order to be able to cast this spell. Each cast consumes one charge from Iban's staff when cast on an NPC, or two charges if cast on another player. Thus this spell can be cast a total of 120 times (60 in [[PvP]]) before the staff must be recharged. This is increased to 2500 (1250 in PvP) with [[Iban's upgraded staff]].

This spell may be [[autocast]] with Iban's staff.

==Cost==
{{Spell cost table
|nostaff = 1
|Rune1 = fire
|Rune1num = 5
|Rune2 = death
|Rune2num = 1
}}
If the player chooses to pay the [[Dark Mage]] to recharge the [[Iban's staff]], at a price of 100,000 coins, an additional cost of {{Coins|100000/120}} coins per spell should be considered. For the [[Iban's upgraded staff]], the price for recharging is 250,000 coins for 2500 spells, reducing the additional cost to {{Coins|250000/2500}} coins per spell. There's also a way to recharge it for free if you enter the cave from the underground pass through the other side. Travel to [[Lletya]] with the teleport crystal and walk north towards the cave entrance. Enter the cave and climb down the well. Make your way to the throne room and open the doors. Use your staff on the well and it will be recharged for free. 

Because Iban's staff is required to cast this spell, the player ''cannot'' use [[elemental staves]] to substitute any of the runes. However, a [[tome of fire]] in the shield slot may be used to substitute [[fire runes]].
Note that Iban Blast is not classified as a [[fire spell]], so casting it will not consume any of the tome's charges and will not provide the 50% damage boost.
